thanks for the upload but i have a problem wondering if anyone else is having the same problem and weather they can sort it out, the game works fine untill i start  a mission and its ok ntill i press the select button on the field this makes it crash for sum reason it doesnt do it if i press select in battle but it like to randomly crass aswell, plz help if u can and thanks in advance,
hey can you plz tell me if this is USA or EUR ver?

I'll quote:

"Fixed it by starting a new game and NOT transferring demo save data.

If your using save data from the demo and it crashs when pressing select on the field i found it is because some of the items you have transfer accross but there names dont so they fill space in your bag but there is nothing there.

I fixed this by going to my item storage and taking out as many items as i could, it even showed up as im holding 16 items but i could still take more out. Doing this fixed the crash problem for me. hope this helps if anyoe else has the same prob."

R1skbreaker, it is EUR.
